text:
e="preserve">Antonio "Tony" Veloso Cuenco (March 26, 1936 – June 27, 2020) was a Filipino politician. He was a council member for the 2nd District of the Cebu City Council. He also was the Secretary-General of the ASEAN Inter-Parliamentary Assembly (AIPA) from 2010 to 2013. He was representative of the 2nd District of Cebu City in the House of Representatives from 1965 to 1969, 1987 to 1998 and 2001 to 2010.
Cuenco died on June 27, 2020 in Cebu City from COVID-19, aged 84.
